ptolemy.actor.lib.gui

Class PlotterBaseJavaSE

  • java.lang.Object
    • ptolemy.actor.lib.gui.PlotterBaseJavaSE
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PlotterBaseInterface

    public class PlotterBaseJavaSE
extends java.lang.Object
implements PlotterBaseInterface
    Java SE implementation of PlotterBaseInterface. The code is largely based on the original platform dependent version of the PlotterBase but was moved here in order to support portability of the actor.
    Since:
    Ptolemy II 10.0
    Author:
    Edward A. Lee Contributors: Anar Huseynov
    Pt.AcceptedRating:
    Red (ahuseyno)
    Pt.ProposedRating:
    Red (ahuseyno)

      Tableau that creates a PlotterPlotFrame.
